short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily hide any annoying elements that pop up in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extensions allows the user to toggle on and off "hiding" functionality, which basically just means that they can remove annoying browser elements from their view.

Learn more in the git repo README: https://github.com/arcticfly/boom-click
